markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 3"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Pick Up the Pace](/Feats.aspx?ID=6495) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=615" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 232 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Constitution +2

</column>

---

You lead by example and can help others push themselves beyond their normal limits. When [Hustling](/Actions.aspx?ID=2626) in a group during exploration mode, your group can Hustle for as long as the member who could Hustle longest on their own.

<title level="2">Pick Up the Pace leads to...</title>
[Caravan Leader](/Feats.aspx?ID=6467)
name: Pick Up the Pace
